list.listitem: Cassiopeia (mythology)(or Cassiepeia), a queen of Ethiopia and mother of Andromeda in Greek mythology
Cassiopeia (constellation), a northern constellation representing the queen
Cassiopeia A, a supernova remnant in that constellation
Cassiopea, the genus of the "upside-down" jellyfish
Cassiopeia (film)''Cassiopeia'' (film), a Brazilian CGI film
Cassiopeia (Battlestar Galactica), a TV character from Battlestar Galactica.
Cassiopea (Encantadia), the first Queen of Lireo in theEncantadiafantasy series of GMA Network
Cassiopeia, a tortoise featured in Michael Ende's fantasy bookMomo (novel)
Cassiopeia, the mother of Octavian inThe Astonishing Life of Octavian Nothing
Casiopea, a Japanese jazz fusion group
Cassiopeia (TVXQ), the fan club of South Korean boy band TVXQ
"Cassiopeia," a song by Joanna Newsom from her 2004 albumThe Milk-Eyed Mender
"Cassiopeia," a song by Dragonland from their 2006 albumAstronomy (Dragonland album)Astronomy
"Cassiopeia," a song byShabtie(now known asCoheed and Cambria) from their 1999 EPThe Penelope EP
"Cassiopeia," a song bySunny Laxfrom his 2006 EPP.U.M.A./Cassopeia
"Cassiopeia," a song byRain (entertainer)from his 2006 albumRain's World
"Cassiopeia," a song by Sara Bareilles from her 2013 albumThe Blessed Unrest
Casio Cassiopeia, a series of pocket PCs
Cassiopeia (train), an overnight rail service in Japan
Kassiopi, a village, and a resort on the affluent north east coast of Corfu.
